name: Frontdrop
description:
Export your components and design system to Frontdrop, integrate the generated code into your web application codebase and publish your website or app.


How to use the plugin?

  • First create a new account here in Frontdrop app
  • Select the frame you want to tranform into code and run our plugin
  • Hit “Send to Frontdrop”
  • Go to your dashboard and your code is ready


Code Export

  • Html and CSS


Limitations

The current version of the Frontdrop design to code plugin does not yet support

  • Responsive code (WIP)
  • Component overrides and variants (WIP)
  • Rich-text elements (WIP)


About Us

Frontdrop.io is a tool that help you skip the 80% of the work building interfaces
